text: Pär Uno Hurtig (born 7 December 1957) is a Swedish rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Sweden Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gothenburg
title: Pär Hurtig
